passive.name: DIRTY FIGHTING
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) DIRTY FIGHTING
                                Every three hits from attacks and abilities deal an additional 25 magic damage (). Against champions, also gains a shield that absorbs 40 damage (40 + 40% bonus ) for 2 seconds (12s ).After launching an attack, Akshan will fire a second shot that deals 29 physical damage (50% ). He can cancel this shot to gain 40-120 Movement Speed decaying over 1 second.Holding down the attack button will fire the second shot.

w.name: (W) GOING ROGUE
w.description:
(W) GOING ROGUE
 14/10/6/2s   30 
                                
                                
                                Passive: Enemies that kill allied champions become Scoundrels for 40 seconds. When Akshan takes down a Scoundrel he gains 100 gold and revives the slain allies. Gain 2% missing mana regen per second when chasing Scoundrels.Active: Become camouflaged for 1.75 seconds and gain 80/90/100/110% Movement Speed toward Scoundrels.Duration is infinite while Akshan is near terrain or in brush.
notes: Duration is infinite while Akshan is near terrain or in brush

e.name: (E) HEROIC SWING
e.description:
(E) HEROIC SWING
 18/16/14/12s   50 
                                
                                
                                Fires a hook to attach and swing around terrain, attacking the nearest enemy for 30 physical damage (30/70/110/150 + 15% bonus ) per shot.If Akshan collides with an enemy champion or terrain, he will jump off the rope.Re-cast:  Jumps off the rope.Champion takedowns refresh this ability's cooldown. Prioritizes champions recently damaged by Akshan.On-hit effects deal 25% damage. Each shot can Critically Strike for 150% damage.Critical Strike damage with  Infinity Edge: 180%

r.name: (R) COMEUPPANCE
r.description:
(R) COMEUPPANCE
 65/60/55s   100 
                                
                                
                                Locks onto an enemy champion, charging 5/6/7 shots over 3 seconds.Re-cast: Fires the shots, dealing 26 physical damage (20/30/40 + 10% ) to the first enemy or structure hit, increased up to 104 physical damage (80/120/160 + 40% ) based on target's missing Health.Each shot's damage is further increased by a percentage equal to 50% of Critical Rate.
